    Author

    • Michael Koch

    mixins

    isGridContainer

    @mixin isGridContainer($colSpec, $rowSpec) { ... }

    Description

    Mixin to define a grid container

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $colSpec

    Number of columns and spec

    		Column specs— none
    $rowSpec

    Number of rows and spec. For no row parse none.

    		Row specs— none

    Requires

    • [placeholder] gridContainerProps

    Author

    • Michael Koch

    isSubGridContainer

    @mixin isSubGridContainer($colSpan, $rowSpan, $rowSpec, $rowSpec) { ... }

    Description

    Mixin to define a sub grid container

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $colSpan

    Column placement in outer grid

    		Column span— none
    $rowSpan

    Row placement in outer grid

    		Row span— none
    $rowSpec

    Number of column and spec in inner grid.

    		Column specs— none
    $rowSpec

    Number of rows and spec in inner grid. For no row parse none.

    		Row specs— none

    Requires

    • [placeholder] gridItemProps
    • [placeholder] gridContainerProps

    Author

    • Michael Koch

    isGridItem

    @mixin isGridItem($colSpan, $rowSpan) { ... }

    Description

    Mixin to define a grid item

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $colSpan

    Row placement in outer grid

    		Column span— none
    $rowSpan

    Column placement in outer grid. For no row parse none.

    		Row span— none

    Requires

    • [placeholder] gridItemProps

    Author

    • Michael Koch

    media quiries

    mixins

    mediaQueries

    @mixin mediaQueries($tablet-width, $desktop-width) { ... }

    Description

    Mixin to make specific compile placement mediaqueries

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $tablet-width

    Below is phone. Between $tablet-width and $dekstop-width is tablet

    		Px— none
    $desktop-width

    Above this is desktop

    		Px— none

    Author

    • Michael Koch

    mq-phone

    @mixin mq-phone() { ... }

    Description

    Mixin to make mediaqueries for phone Use like: @include mq-phone{ color: black; }

    Parameters

    None.

    Content

    This mixin allows extra content to be passed (through the @content directive).

    Author

    • Michael Koch

    mq-custom

    @mixin mq-custom($min, $max) { ... }

    Description

    Mixin to make custom mediaqueries Use like: @include mq-custom(700px, 1200px){ color: black; }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $min

    Minimum size

    		Px— none
    $max

    Maximum size

    		Px— none

    Content

    This mixin allows extra content to be passed (through the @content directive).

    Author

    • Michael Koch
